report.title: Occurrences Download for COBIMO V2
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data from COBIMO.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o on o.id=co.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN samples schild on schild.id=o.sample_id AND schild.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=schild.parent_id and s.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=co.website_id JOIN sample_attribute_values rsav ON rsav.sample_id = s.id AND rsav.deleted = FALSE AND rsav.int_value = 1 and rsav.sample_attribute_id = #closed_attr_id# #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ('#quality#'::text = 'NA'::text OR quality_check('#quality#', co.record_status, co.certainty)=true) AND co.survey_id='#survey_id#' AND ('#download#'::text != 'OFF'::text OR co.downloaded_flag = 'F'::bpchar) AND ('#download#'::text != 'INITIAL'::text OR co.downloaded_flag in ('N'::bpchar, 'I'::bpchar)) AND (('#download#'::text != 'CONFIRM'::text AND '#download#'::text != 'FINAL'::text) OR (co.downloaded_flag = 'I'::bpchar AND NOT EXISTS (select io.id from occurrences io, samples sc where io.sample_id = sc.id and sc.parent_id = s.id and sc.deleted = FALSE and io.deleted = FALSE and io.downloaded_flag = 'N'::bpchar)))

param.name: download
param.description: Carry out as a download... Final Downloaded records are set to read only.
param.lookup_values: OFF:No,INITIAL:sweep up all records,CONFIRM:Final but dont mark records,FINAL:Final + mark records

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: closed_attr_id
param.display: Sample Attribute ID for Closed flag:
param.description: ID of sample_attribute for sample closed flag

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '->' END || co.recorders

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE co.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Dubious' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Complete' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE co.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(co.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE co.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: strokecolor
column.sql: case co.record_status when 'C' then case co.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fillcolor
column.sql: case co.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end
